location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP No. 4 to illustrate operations in Persian Arabistan.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 215 x 363mm, on sheet 313 x 427mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume I, and shows a border region of south-eastern Iraq and south-western Persia, indicating the Turco-Persian frontier, towns, settlements, and relief with approximate form lines. Rivers and marshes are printed in blue.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in June 1922.
